title: Drawing, "Design for Bedroom", ca. 1950
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on illustration board
inscribed: Lower left in graphite: "Parzinger Originals Inc."; lower right: "Rendering #8"
description: Bedroom interior in white, yellow, and orange tones; wallpaper, drapery and bedcover in fern pattern; dresser and matching bedside tables in white (lacquer) decorated with Greek key motif; cane headboard with attached swing arm lamps; bed is set on a white rug.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Bedroom", ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. Brush and watercolor, graphite on illustration board. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-118.
